text: Na'ankure Israeli vahe'ene Juda vahemo'zanena maka kefo avu'ava zama nehaza zamo Nagrira nazeri narimpa ahe'ne. Ana nehazage'za kini vahe zamimo'zane, kva vahe zamimo'zane, pristi vahe zamimo'zane, kasnampa vahe zamimo'zane, maka Juda venenemo'zane, Jerusalemi rankumapima nemaniza vahe'mo'za zamagranena havi avu'ava zanke hu'za nazeri narimpa ahe'naze.
